DOC.brief_title: Clomiphene Citrate Combination With Gonadotropins Ovarian Stimulation Women With Poor Ovarian Response .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients diagnose poor ovarian response include study . The definition poor response base presence least one follow criterion : Age > 40 year old , day 2 FSH > 9.5 mIU/ml , AMH < 2ng/ml , least one previous COH le 3 oocyte retrieve , least one cancelled attempt due poor response , estradiol less 500 pg/ml day HCG . All patient counsel regard prognosis treatment option include oocyte donation well adoption also present discussed detail . Early follicular phase FSH , estradiol ( E2 ) Anti-Mullerian Hormone ( AMH ) measure prior initiation treatment . Women Clomiphene group receive 100-150 mg Clomiphene citrate per day 5 day combination gonadotropins accord short GnRH-antagonist protocol : woman measurement serum FSH estradiol pelvic sonogram second day cycle . Providing serum FSH < 17 mIU/ml estradiol < 70 pg/ml day 2 , ovarian stimulation initiate 100-150 mg Clomiphene citrate combination 450 IU gonadotropin either form combination highly purified urinary FSH LH combination Rec FSH Rec LH . All patient re-evaluated day 5 stimulation , dosage adjustment make antagonist ( Cetrorelix ganirelix 0.25 mg/day ) initiate . When least 2 follicle reach average diameter 17 mm , final oocyte maturation trigger 10,000IU hCG ( Pregnyl , Organon , Greece Inc. ) . Oocyte retrieval perform 34 36 hour later . All patient undergo ICSI . Patients successful fertilization embryo transfer sonographic guidance day 3 retrieval . Women Gonadotropin group receive gonadotropin accord short GnRH-antagonist protocol mention .
DOC.criteria: Women poor response ovarian stimulation . The definition poor response base presence least one follow criterion : Age > 40 year old , day 2 FSH > 9.5 mIU/ml , AMH < 2ng/ml , least one previous COH le 3 oocyte retrieve , least one cancelled attempt due poor response , estradiol less 500 pg/ml day HCG . All woman fulfill mention criterion
